      • CalcServerOriginator

        public CalcServerOriginator​(java.lang.String name,
                            PlatformDefinition platform)
        Creates a new Calculation Server Connector object for use in connecting to the given server.
        Parameters:
        name - a String containing the context in which the connection will be used. This should be a human-readable name for use in logging and error messages.

      • getCurrentOpenPort

        public static int getCurrentOpenPort()
        Returns the currently open port for the calculation server for the current user by reading ~/.snap/.cs.port.
        Returns:
        the current open port or -1 if the file is missing or cannot be read.
